director.name: 娜娜·梅切莉泽 Nana Mchedlidze

introduction: 经典的格鲁吉亚乡村儿童片，女导演Nana Mchedlidze的作品并不常见。This film tells of the relationship between children and adults. Completed the Great Patriotic War. Little Zuriko, who is 6 years old, lives with his grandmother in a small Georgian village. The mother left the boy and his father at the front. Zuriko look forward to his father. But the father returned from the war is not one, it comes with a new wife, aunt Iano. All this does not like the boy, and among them, father and Iano conflict begins. Quarrel is trying to repay her grandmother, that it is taken for some time Zuriko in the city.Nana Mchedlidze - Date of birth 20 March 1926, Khoni (Georgia). People's Artist of Georgi (1983). Received Merit Award (1997). Graduated actor faculty of Tbilisi State Theatre Institute in 1950 and film directing faculty in 1957. In 1950 – 1954 worked at Rustaveli State Theatre as an actress.。
